fields.label: Post Query
fields.name: post_query
fields.instructions: Additional get_posts() parameters as a URL string format. Uses parse_str().

fields.label: List Item Classes
fields.name: list_item_classes
fields.default_value: border-l-2 border-zinc-700 pl-4 relative hover:border-amber-400 tab-content

fields.label: Auto Expand
fields.name: auto_expand
fields.instructions: Automatically open menu up to current page.

fields.label: Shortcode Slug
fields.name: slug
fields.instructions: No spaces, only use underscores or hypens. Name of shortcode to be registered.

fields.label: Help
fields.name: help
fields.instructions: This is the structure of the code when rendered on the page.
fields.default_value:
// Top Level unordered list open
    • // List item open & close + Link open & close.
  • // List Item open & close. // Link open & close.
      // Unordered list open
    • // List Item open // Link open Heading(count) // Count // Link Close
      • // List item close
    // Unordered list close
    • // List item close
// Top Level - Unordered list close The boxes below allow you to inject code around any of the opening or closing tags within the structure. It also includes around the (20) count number too. Usage of moustache {{name}}, {{tax_id}}, etc.. allowed in textbox to substitute for real value. This will be a WP_Term object.

sub_fields.label: Prefix Top Unordered List Open
sub_fields.name: prefix_top_unordered_list_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before top-level unordered list open (ul)

sub_fields.label: Suffix Top Unordered List Open
sub_fields.name: suffix_top_unordered_list_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after top-level unordered list open (ul)

sub_fields.label: Prefix Top Unordered List Close
sub_fields.name: prefix_top_unordered_list_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before top-level unordered list close (/ul)

sub_fields.label: Suffix Top Unordered List Close
sub_fields.name: suffix_top_unordered_list_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after top-level unordered list close (/ul)

sub_fields.label: Prefix Unordered List Open
sub_fields.name: prefix_unordered_list_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before unordered list open (ul)

sub_fields.label: Suffix Unordered List Open
sub_fields.name: suffix_unordered_list_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after unordered list open (ul)

sub_fields.label: Prefix Unordered List Close
sub_fields.name: prefix_unordered_list_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before unordered list close (/ul)

sub_fields.label: Suffix Unordered List Close
sub_fields.name: suffix_unordered_list_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after unordered list close (/ul)

sub_fields.label: Prefix List Item Open
sub_fields.name: prefix_list_item_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before list item open (li)

sub_fields.label: Suffix List Item Open
sub_fields.name: suffix_list_item_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after list item open(LI)

sub_fields.label: Prefix List Item Close
sub_fields.name: prefix_list_item_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before list item close (/li)

sub_fields.label: Suffix List Item Close
sub_fields.name: suffix_list_item_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after list item close (/li)

sub_fields.label: Prefix Link Open
sub_fields.name: prefix_link_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before opening A tag.

sub_fields.label: Suffix Link Open
sub_fields.name: suffix_link_open
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after opening A tag.

sub_fields.label: Prefix Link Close
sub_fields.name: prefix_link_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before closing A tag.

sub_fields.label: Suffix Link Close
sub_fields.name: suffix_link_close
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after closing A tag.

sub_fields.label: Prefix Count
sub_fields.name: prefix_count
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately before (20) number count.

sub_fields.label: Suffix Count
sub_fields.name: suffix_count
sub_fields.instructions: Add code immediately after (20) number count.

fields.label: style
fields.name: style
fields.instructions: Add CSS styles. No need to wrap in style tags - automatically done.
